steps.title: Sketch an outline of the face and body.
steps.content: Sketch an outline of the face and body. Use a square with curved edges as an outline of the face. Draw a crossed line at the center of your square. Draw an oblong for the outline of the body.

steps.title: Sketch the eyes, nose and ears.
steps.content: Sketch the eyes, nose and ears.

steps.title: Sketch circles for the base of the cow’s limbs.

steps.title: Draw an outline of the body.
steps.content: Draw an outline of the body. Use a vertical rectangle with a crossed line at the center for the face. Draw two large oblongs and connect them with curved lines for the body.

steps.title: Add a small oblong for the base of the foreleg and a bigger oblong for the base of the hind leg.
steps.content: Add a small oblong for the base of the foreleg and a bigger oblong for the base of the hind leg.

steps.title: Add the limbs, taking note of the joints using small circles.
steps.content: Add the limbs, taking note of the joints using small circles. Draw the tail on the back of the cow.

steps.title: Refine details of the face by adding the eyes, nose and mouth.
steps.content: Refine details of the face by adding the eyes, nose and mouth.

steps.title: Using your outline, darken desired lines to form the cow’s trunk.
steps.content: Using your outline, darken desired lines to form the cow’s trunk. Add the udders.

steps.title: Refine the lines of the limbs and tail.
steps.content: Refine the lines of the limbs and tail.

steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines and add random small strokes on the cow’s body.

steps.title: Draw small and big circles as guides for the head and the body.
steps.content: Draw small and big circles as guides for the head and the body. The smaller circle is for the head and bigger is for the body. It should be connected the head’s circle is inside the bigger circle.

steps.title: Then, sketch the nose and the mouth.
steps.content: Then, sketch the nose and the mouth. The nose could be oblong or circle depending on your preference.

steps.content: Add the face, the nose, the ears, the small horns, the eyes and the mouth. You can also experiment on the expression. The ears should be droopy.
